snippet.title: Geography of Leiden
snippet.description: The geography of Leiden enhances the natural beauty and majesty of Europe. Learn more about the geography of Leiden at HowStuffWorks...Leiden, or Leyden, Netherlands, a city in Zuid (South) Holland province. It is on the Oude Rijn (Old Rhine) River near the North Sea, about 20 miles...
